text: Jo [a'molaş] hamcun torikihoe dar darjoi ƶarf ast, ki mavçe onro mepūşonad va ʙar farozi on mavçe digar ast, [va] ʙar farozaş aʙre [torik] qaror dorad. Torikihoe ast, jake ʙar farozi digare [cunon ki] agar [şaxsi gumgaşta] dasti xudro ʙerun ovarad, mumkin nest onro ʙuʙinad. Va kase, ki Alloh taolo nure [az hidojat] ʙarojaş qaror nadoda ʙoşad, pas, [heç hidojat va] nure ʙarojaş nest
